summary: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?
cast: George Segal|Robert Vaughn|Ben Gazzara|Bradford Dillman|E.G. Marshall|Peter van Eyck|Hans Christian Blech|Heinz Reincke|Joachim Hansen|Sonja Ziemann|Anna Gaël|Vít Olmer|Bo Hopkins|Robert Logan|Matt Clark|Steve Sandor|Frank Webb|Tom Heaton|Paul Prokop|Richard Münch|Günter Meisner|Rudolf Kalina|Rudolf Jelínek|Fritz Ford|Pavel Solty|Rolf Jahncke|Zdenek Braunschläger|Jan Schánilec|Václav Neuzil|Vladimír T. Gottwald|Heikedine Körting|Karel Mares
keywords: river rhine|world war two|based on true story|bridge|battle
title: El puente de Remagen
